Title: Gogol. Viy
Writer: Aleksey Chupov, Aleksey Karaulov, Natasha Merkulova
Actors: Alexander Petrov, Evgeniy Stychkin, Artyom Suchkov, Taisiya Vilkova
Plot: A Russian fantasy sequel to "Gogol: The Beginning (2017). Again, Nikolai Gogol, the leading character from the 2017 film, a young man who suffered unpredictable violent epileptic seizures, ...
